name: check_inventory_orders
description: Check the current inventory and orders.

name: restock_item
description: Restock a certain quantity of an item based on the order list.

item_id.description: The ID of the item to be restocked.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item to restock.

name: list_files
description: Lists all files in the warehouse database.

name: send_file
description: Send a file to all the employees.

file_name.description: The name of the file to send.
